{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:16.100
    | text      = So, Jordan, we start off here on Thursday with Alex talking pretty extreme.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:22.500
    | text      = But he also wants to remind you, he didn't always talk like this, he didn't always talk
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:26.480
    | text      = so extreme.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:27.480
    | text      = No, no, no.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:28.480
    | text      = This is different back when.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:29.480
    | text      = The world is being artificially put into a cascade of crises that will lead to the accelerated
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:36.300
    | text      = controlled collapse and the mass death of billions upon billions of people.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:41.920
    | text      = Sure.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:42.920
    | text      = Folks would tune into the broadcast 25 years ago and think that when I made these type
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:47.519
    | text      = of predictions off in the future, I said 25, 30 years from now, they will be organizing
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:53.000
    | text      = the collapse of civilization and the great culling.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:58.120
    | text      = And it sounded a bit fanciful back then even though I was reading from source documents.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:02.439
    | text      = Well now it doesn't seem too fanciful anymore, does it?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:07.160
    | text      = We're here.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:08.360
    | text      = That kind of talk I never really would think I would describe as fanciful, that's not the
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:12.600
    | text      = term I would use.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:13.600
    | text      = But this is a really sad attempt on Alex's part to misrepresent how he carried himself
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:17.759
    | text      = in his earlier career.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:19.379
    | text      = He's pretending that in the present day, he's saying that the end is right in front of our
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:22.600
    | text      = faces.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:23.600
    | text      = But 20 years ago, he would say that the end was coming in 20 years, which it's almost
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:27.180
    | text      = like he's totally right about everything.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:29.120
    | text      = It's a complete vindication of everything he's ever believed, right Dan?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:33.120
    | text      = This is total horseshit.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:34.120
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:35.120
    | text      = In his earlier career, Alex was very similar to how he is now, but he would just say that
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:38.519
    | text      = the globalists were 10 years behind in their plans or whatever when his predictions didn't
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:42.720
    | text      = come to pass.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:44.000
    | text      = He didn't say that in 20 years shit would be going down, he was saying that disaster
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:47.600
    | text      = was coming imminently, pretty consistently.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:50.800
    | text      = I could go through many examples of this, how over the years it was just a consistent
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:55.519
    | text      = pattern, but because it's more fun this way, here's a clip of him from May 5th, 1998, where
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:01.040
    | text      = he predicts that within two years, there will be complete martial law with hit teams roaming
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:05.639
    | text      = the streets.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:06.639
    | text      = Two years, you will have a massive crash in this country, you will have a massive criminal
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:11.279
    | text      = consolidation of wealth, you will have a police state, people will be rounded up wholesale,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:16.079
    | text      = you'll barely hear about it on the news.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:18.560
    | text      = You will have successive bombings, successive explosions.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:22.319
    | text      = You will have FBI agents coming out being killed, the government will tell you they're
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:26.360
    | text      = traitors.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:27.360
    | text      = You'll have CIA people being killed, DEA people being killed, local sheriffs being killed,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:31.160
    | text      = being imprisoned.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:32.159
    | text      = You'll have hit squads running all over the nation, killing people.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:36.600
    | text      = Get ready.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:37.600
    | text      = That didn't happen?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:38.600
    | text      = That didn't come to pass, no.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:40.600
    | text      = Are you sure?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:41.600
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:42.600
    | text      = Alex never predicted that collapses were coming 20 years down the line because that's not
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:45.120
    | text      = good for business.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:46.679
    | text      = One of Alex's most essential tools in terms of fucking with his audience is creating the
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:50.840
    | text      = sense of emergency, where the information he's yelling about is the most important thing
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:55.039
    | text      = right now, and that sensation is lost when you're trying to make someone scared of something
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:59.120
    | text      = that's supposed to happen in two decades.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:01.480
    | text      = The difference between Alex's earlier career and now is that we're currently in the middle
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:05.120
    | text      = of a protracted societal challenge in the form of COVID, and it's something that fits
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:09.000
    | text      = very perfectly into his strategy of making people scared of how the end is right around
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:12.759
    | text      = the corner.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:13.840
    | text      = He's smart enough to know that his fear-mongering and doomsday shit sounds way less convincing
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:17.679
    | text      = if people realize he's been doing the exact same thing for years.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:21.240
    | text      = And the way around that is to pretend that all along he's been saying that this big thing
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:24.279
    | text      = was coming a ways off in the future, which would coincide with him saying now that, oh,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:29.120
    | text      = the end is here.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:30.120
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:31.120
    | text      = The end is here.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:32.120
    | text      = Like I said, it was going to be here in 20 years, 20 years ago.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:34.120
    | text      = Nope.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:35.120
    | text      = Sorry.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:36.120
    | text      = It'd be a little bit like if Nostradamus' writings were actually like, he said all of
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:39.279
    | text      = that stuff was going to happen tomorrow, and then when it didn't, he was like, actually
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:42.399
    | text      = it's going to be a thousand years from now.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:43.919
    | text      = Huh?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:44.919
    | text      = How about that?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:45.919
    | text      = It would be way less revered if he had a long-winded radio show where he had filled way too much
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:54.120
    | text      = time.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:55.120
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:56.120
    | text      = And it would be rhyming, and that's no fun.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:57.120
    | text      = Actually, I would like Alex to try.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:58.600
    | text      = To try rhyming?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:59.600
    | text      = Yes.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:00.600
    | text      = I think it would make things a little interesting.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:03.240
    | text      = Get a Beastie Boy right next to him to really hammer home the, yeah, I like it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:07.360
    | text      = So Alex's studio is a little ominous.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:09.559
    | text      = It's looking a little bit spooky today, and he describes why in this clip.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:15.000
    | text      = If you're a TV viewer, you see the image we have behind us of the US Capitol occupied
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:19.440
    | text      = by the globalist with red storms in the background with lightning.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:25.399
    | text      = That's about the best way I can describe the true evil that has control of our government
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:31.679
    | text      = at almost every level.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:32.840
    | text      = We are the bad guys.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:34.840
    | text      = We have been captured because we were the good guys.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:38.960
    | text      = We became the most powerful, wealthy, loved nation in the world.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:41.960
    | text      = Still had incredible problems, but because we had a Christian but also rugged Western
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:47.559
    | text      = Renaissance bearing, we were the freest, greatest, most productive nation on earth.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:53.240
    | text      = Evil came, took over, and now we have become a slave of the new world order, and the wages
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:04.000
    | text      = of sin are death.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:05.639
    | text      = Uh-oh.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:06.639
    | text      = So what is, that feels just like Christian nationalism poking its little head up again.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:11.440
    | text      = Because, I mean, it's got to be that the thing that went bad was the country's not Christian
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:17.600
    | text      = anymore.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:18.600
    | text      = Yeah, yeah, yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:19.600
    | text      = Not Christian enough for him.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:20.600
    | text      = We're allowed to have sex.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:21.600
    | text      = Uh-huh.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:22.600
    | text      = Outside of marriage.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:23.600
    | text      = Because I don't feel like it's that we're not rugged enough, right?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:28.240
    | text      = That's not the complaint Alex is making.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:30.200
    | text      = Oh, you might make that complaint.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:31.679
    | text      = I mean, you know, there's not much rugged about going to the grocery store when you're
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:36.279
    | text      = hungry.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:37.279
    | text      = I will admit that.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:38.279
    | text      = You know.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:39.279
    | text      = Instead of going out and shooting a bison.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:40.919
    | text      = I have yet to push a herd of bison over a cliff in order to insure my sustenance for
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:47.960
    | text      = the following winter.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:49.259
    | text      = It is less rugged.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:50.559
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:51.559
    | text      = Certainly DoorDash.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:52.559
    | text      = It really struggles with ruggedness.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:56.720
    | text      = If the Unabomber is against it, it's probably less rugged than you would like.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:00.279
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:01.279
    | text      = The government is captured because sort of Christian-oriented policies aren't what is
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:08.120
    | text      = law.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:09.120
    | text      = Yeah, yeah, yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:10.120
    | text      = I don't think that's enough for Alex.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:11.120
    | text      = No, the laws of Deuteronomy should probably run most adult nations.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:14.940
    | text      = Although I don't think Alex would particularly like it if that kind of theocratic state were
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:19.559
    | text      = actually enacted.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:20.559
    | text      = Oh, my tattoos would be a real problem.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:22.360
    | text      = Well, no, I mean, he wouldn't like it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:24.360
    | text      = Oh, no, they'd really be pissed.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:25.360
    | text      = Would you like it if Austin was a dry county?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:27.720
    | text      = Ooh, ooh.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:29.440
    | text      = I don't think so.
}}
